title: Possibility of selecting text from links
body:
Make a possibility of selecting text from links as it was in Opera <=12 or Firefox (with alt key pressed).
The perfect option: drag left/right - text selection; up/down - drag&drop

comments.body: MS should implement in IE Opera/Presto's behavior where click and drag in mostly vertical directions triggers a link drag while click and drag in mostly horizontal directions triggers text selection.
